content.raw: I see there's ign-math being used in this class, and there are methods starting with `Get`. We were taking the opportunity to change to ign-math and deprecate Get methods when pimplizing. I don't think it's necessary for all these changes to be in the same pull request though, I just thought I should mention it.
content.html: I see there's ign-math being used in this class, and there are methods starting with Get. We were taking the opportunity to change to ign-math and deprecate Get methods when pimplizing. I don't think it's necessary for all these changes to be in the same pull request though, I just thought I should mention it.
